name: Slingshot
headline: Analyze medical records in seconds
description:
Slingshot is AI  that analyzes medical records to determine if the diagnosis is supported by the clinical evidence.

The company is founded by Pranov Duggasani, a former Google and Microsoft AI engineer, and Zoe Holderness, a former Lyft and Tesla engineer. They started working on Slingshot after facing their own frustrations with inflated and erroneous medical bills with the goal to save patients more money with less work.

founders.name: Pranov Duggasani, Founder
founders.description: Using AI to align patient care and clinical outcomes with payments

# AI to Automate Coding and Clinical Validation
Improve selection by analyzing medical records to determine the least supported claims so teams can spend time on the most impactful claims.
We speed up payment integrity teams. Connect with us to learn how.
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong! Try again later
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/6599681b34f8cfe5325b8927_ValidateDocsScreenshot.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/655ccf353d66aaecb4da9059_Searc%20Icon.svg)
Improve Selection
Improve the selection of erroneous medical records to review.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/655ccf353d66aaecb4da9058_Workspace.svg)
Increase Bandwidth
Models extract clinical indicators to save reviewers time searching through pages of medical records. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/655ccf353d66aaecb4da9042_Hero%20Icon%2002.svg)
Improve Accuracy
Implement a repeatable process based on clinical guidelines at a high level of accuracy.
## An API Built for Payment Integrity Teams
Power your coding and clinical chart reviews with Slingshot. 
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/655ccf353d66aaecb4da9059_Searc%20Icon.svg)DRG Clinical ValidationMore than just highlighting key words or coding validation. Our models understand medical records and analyze them to identify appropriate clinical criteria.](https://slingshotml.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/655ccf353d66aaecb4da9058_Workspace.svg)Configurable Clinical CriteriaOur software is customizable to be set up for different clinical criteria. Using Sepsis 2 criteria for medicare plans and Sepsis 3 for commercial plans? No problem.](https://slingshotml.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/655ccf353d66aaecb4da905a_Lock.svg)Protect Your DataWe keep your data secure and confidential with top-tier encryption standards like the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES 256) and Transport Layer Security (TLS). Our services are HIPAA compliant and hold SOC2 Type 2 certification, ensuring the highest standards of privacy and security.](https://slingshotml.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/655ccf353d66aaecb4da9057_Users.svg)Monitor PerformanceWe love numbers and are sure you do too. We monitor accuracy, precision, recall, drift, F1-score and more. We are constantly improving our models accordingly. ](https://slingshotml.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/65998bebdc2d54d5cdf2175b_AdminDashboardLong.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/65998bebdc2d54d5cdf2175b_AdminDashboardLong.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/65998bebdc2d54d5cdf2175b_AdminDashboardLong.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/65998bebdc2d54d5cdf2175b_AdminDashboardLong.png)
## Security
We keep your data secure and confidential with top-tier encryption standards like the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES 256) and Transport Layer Security (TLS). Our services are HIPAA compliant and hold SOC2 Type 2 certification, ensuring the highest standards of privacy and security.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/655ccf353d66aaecb4da905a_Lock.svg)
HIPAA Compliant
Slingshot is HIPAA compliant and able to sign a Business Associate Agreement (BAA). 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655ccf343d66aaecb4da8fa2/655ccf353d66aaecb4da905a_Lock.svg)
SOC 2 Certified
Slingshot is SOC2 Type II certified.

See how you can use Slingshot

generated_description:
### Slingshot: Revolutionizing Medical Record Analysis

**Mission:** Simply put, Slingshot is on a quest to analyze medical records in seconds. They've set out to cut through the noise of inflated and erroneous medical bills, aiming to save patients money while relieving the burden on healthcare providers.

**Founders:** The company was co-founded by Pranov Duggasani and Zoe Holderness, both seasoned engineers with rich backgrounds at tech giants like Google, Microsoft, Lyft, and Tesla. Their own experiences with medical billing frustrations spurred them into action.

**Background:** Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, Slingshot is based in the heart of San Francisco. It operates with a tight-knit team of four, showing that you don’t need a massive workforce to make a significant impact in the tech landscape.

**What They Do:** Slingshot leverages AI to automate the coding and clinical validation of medical records. Their technology helps healthcare payment integrity teams identify less-supported claims, streamlining which records deserve the most attention. Here are the key highlights of their offering:

1. **Improve Selection:** The AI quickly identifies which medical records are erroneous, allowing teams to focus on the most impactful cases.
2. **Increase Bandwidth:** By extracting critical clinical indicators, their system saves reviewers from sifting endlessly through pages of data.
3. **Enhance Accuracy:** Their models adhere to clinical guidelines, consistently ensuring high levels of precision in analysis.

**Security Commitment:** Data protection is no afterthought here. Slingshot employs robust encryption methods and is HIPAA compliant, holding a SOC 2 Type 2 certification to ensure the highest standards of privacy and security.

**Contact:** Interested in discovering how Slingshot can transform your medical billing workflow? Check out their [website](https://slingshotml.com) for documentation and to get started with a demo.

In a world where healthcare billing can feel like a labyrinth, Slingshot is acting as a guiding light, simplifying processes for both patients and providers. If you’re knee-deep in medical records, this might just be the slingshot you need.
